org.mixare.data

Class DataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mixare.data.DataHandler
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MixareDataProcessor, OsmDataProcessor, PanoramioDataProcessor, RemoteDataHandler, TwitterDataProcessor, WikiDataProcessor

    public class DataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
    DataHandler is the model which provides the Marker Objects with its data. DataHandler is also the Factory for new Marker objects.
